creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Doris Wiener
description: five boats full of human figures along the R side; spotty black and gray abstracted shoreline or foliage along L; inscription URQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Mark, Seals, and Sticker

URQ: [ 嵐□大會詩儔満船 ] (Full boats of poet companions having a great meeting at Arashiyama.) (SA)
markings: mark top L when rolled, in pencil: [M. Kien LS]; URC, oval relief; upper center, square intaglio: [ 皆川愿印 ]; upper center, square intaglio: [ 淇園 ]; sticker on R roller end: [M Kien]
title: Poet's Party in Arashiyama
